item.title: Can this nasal spray slow down Alzheimer's? One couple is helping scientists find out
item.description: Joe Walsh is the first Alzheimer's patient to be treated with an experimental nasal spray designed to reduce inflammation in the brain.

item.title: Trump administration's vaccines announcements have many health experts alarmed

item.title: American Doctors Are Moving to Canada To Escape the Trump Administration
item.description: Canada has seen a surge of American doctors seeking to move north in the months since President Donald Trump returned to the White House.

item.title: Recortes en servicios de idiomas generan temor a errores médicos, diagnósticos equivocados y muertes
item.description: Cerca de 69 millones de personas en el país hablan un idioma que no es inglés, y 26 millones de ellas hablan inglés, pero no con fluidez.
